item.title: daily fintech: Bitcoin Maximalism is deeply threatening to Wall Street - Puntaje: 200
item.description: What if somebody around 1995 had given you a simple way to invest in the Internet? All we had around 1995 to 2000 was the option to invest in the ventures being sold by the Wealth Intermediation business. Today, if you want to invest in the Blockchain Economy, there is one incredibly simple way to […]

item.title: Cointelegraph: Bitcoin Breaks $4,000 as Top Cryptos See Growth - Puntaje: 200
item.description: Bitcoin has broken $4,000 as nearly all of the top 20 cryptocurrencies report slight to noteworthy gains

item.title: Cointelegraph: Blockchain and Crypto Business Reps Protest Nevada Bill - Puntaje: 900
item.description: Crypto and blockchain industry reps voiced their concern over a new piece of legislation in the Nevada State Senate

item.title: CoinDesk: Riot Blockchain to Launch Regulated Crypto Exchange in the US - Puntaje: 2100
item.description: Riot Blockchain is planning to launch a regulated exchange in the U.S. to offer crypto banking and trading services.

item.title: CoinDesk: Caution and Crypto Custody: Convenient Companions - Puntaje: 300
item.description: Crypto custody is more complex than most of us realize, explains Noelle Acheson. Caution is wise, even if it slows institutional involvement.

item.title: Cointelegraph: Riot Blockchain Plans Launch of Regulated Cryptocurrency Exchange in the US - Puntaje: 1300
item.description: A filing with the SEC revealed that Riot Blockchain plans to launch a new regulated cryptocurrency exchange called RiotX in the U.S. by the end of 2019
